prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with vibrant blue scales and elegant fins.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a fish, featuring unique pink and blue patterns.
Generate a cute aquatic creature that can swim gracefully in ocean waters.
Make a small, colorful Pokemon that embodies the essence of a serene sea.
Imagine a Pokemon with large fins and a sleek body, perfect for underwater agility.
Design a playful water Pokemon that loves to dance among coral reefs.
Show me an adorable fish Pokemon with a striking color palette.
